import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import '../styles/BetSlip.css'; import API from '../utils/API'; const BetSlip = (props) => { console.log('inside') return(
{props.data.awayTeam}
vs. {props.data.homeTeam}
{props.slipData.type === 'MONEYLINE' ?
MONEYLINE: {props.slipData.team} ({props.slipData.odds})
: '' } {props.slipData.type === 'SPREAD' ?
SPREAD: {props.slipData.team} {props.slipData.line} ({props.slipData.odds})
: '' } {props.slipData.type === 'TOTALS-UNDER' ?
TOTAL: {props.slipData.team} U/{props.slipData.line} ({props.slipData.odds})
: '' } {props.slipData.type === 'TOTALS-OVER' ?
TOTAL: {props.slipData.team} O/{props.slipData.line} ({props.slipData.odds})
: '' }


handleChange(event.target.value, slip.slipData)} />


{toWin}
); }; export default BetSlip;
